## parsePageId variable

Robustly extracts the notion page ID from a notion URL or pathname suffix.

Defaults to returning a UUID (with dashes).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
parsePageId: (id?: string | null, { uuid }?: {
    uuid?: boolean;
}) => string
```
